entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Yoho (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:13 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.3°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
